main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Martinez, California on August 5, 1965, involving a round light in the night sky.
interesting points: The UFO was described as being the size of a basketball, with a yellow-white color,The object had a total of 119.2 lights and 6 smaller lights in line,The movement of the UFO was sudden and it displayed attraction due to its motion,There was no sound associated with the object,The sighting was reported by 5 witnesses and lasted for 15 minutes.
